entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:59 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:59 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:59 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
